topic.title: MEDICATION GIVEN DURING LABOUR (SNOMED CT DM+D)
topic.shortdesc: MEDICATION GIVEN DURING LABOUR (SNOMED CT DM+D) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID from the NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices which is used to identify the type of medication given to the mother during Labour and Delivery.
